FILE: cm230365v11.0.txtDYAD: SPAIN - RUSSIA/USSRRIVALRY: RIV614DISPUTE(S): MID89 RIVALRY: RIV615DISPUTE(S): MID258 RIVALRY: RIV2008DISPUTE(S): MID4342 PS-NOTES:PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180213PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180213Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues VariablesPre-1900 MIDs: MID89 WWII MIDs: MID258MID4342 TERRMID: MID4342 3 -- not territory TERRMID-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain TERRMID-NOTES: TERRLINK: MID4342 1 -- third party link to territorialTERRLINK-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain TERRLINK-NOTES: MID4342 from Gibler 2018, this is connected to a NATO bombing in Yugoslavia. Russia put its forces on high alert and warned NATO against provoking a broader war. Coded third party link to territorial MID because Spain, as part of NATO, and Russia were supporting opposite sides of the Yugoslavian Wars, a series of territorial disputes. MARITMID: MID4342 3 -- not maritime MARITMID-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain MARITMID-NOTES: ISLMID: MID4342 3 -- not islands ISLMID-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain ISLMID-NOTES: CIVWARMID: MID4342 3 -- not civil war CIVWARMID-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain CIVWARMID-NOTES:CIVWARLINK: MID4342 1 -- civil war link CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain CIVWARLINK-NOTES: MID4342 from Gibler 2018, this involves Spain (as part of NATO) war activity in Yugoslavia, who Russia was supporting. Coded civil war link because the Yugoslav Wars featured extensive violence by militarized rebel groups organized along ethnic lines, and Yugoslavia is outside this dyad. COUPMID: MID4342 3 -- not coup COUPMID-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain COUPMID-NOTES: COUPLINK: MID4342 3 -- not coup linkCOUPLINK-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain COUPLINK-NOTES: MID3 1993-2001:MID4342rivalry=230365 nationa=RUSSIA/USSR nationb=SPAIN MID4342 19990408-19990419  revtype1a=POLICY revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=DISPLAY OF FORCE  revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0lhostb=NO MILITARIZED ACTION First day of dispute was on 4/8/1999 and last day of dispute was on 4/19/1999.NO DISPUTE NARRATIVE AVAILABLE FROM COWRIVNOTES: RIV2008: new rivalry because MID4342 was added by MID3.02NARRATIVE-CM:SOURCES-CM:NARRATIVE-CR:SOURCES-CR:SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
